themes.name: brand-awareness
themes.description: Measures the extent to which consumers are familiar with a brand and its products.
themes.query: brand OR brand name OR #brand OR #brand

themes.name: customer-engagement
themes.description: Evaluates how actively customers interact with a brand across various channels.
themes.query: engagement OR interact OR interaction OR customer interaction OR customer engagement OR user engagement OR brand engagement

themes.name: sales-performance
themes.description: Tracks the effectiveness of sales strategies and the overall sales process.
themes.query: sales growth OR revenue growth OR sales increase OR conversion rate OR deal size OR sales performance OR revenue performance OR sales metrics

themes.name: market-trends
themes.description: Analyzes current market conditions and emerging trends that affect business strategies.
themes.query: market trend OR market share OR industry trend OR consumer trend OR competitive analysis OR market analysis OR consumer behavior

themes.name: product-development
themes.description: Focuses on the innovation and improvement of products to meet customer needs.
themes.query: product development OR new product OR product feature OR product innovation OR product launch OR time to market OR product adoption

themes.name: customer-satisfaction
themes.description: Measures the level of satisfaction customers have with a product or service.
themes.query: customer satisfaction OR customer experience OR customer feedback OR nps OR net promoter score OR csat OR customer satisfaction score
